channel.title: About on The Modern Jihad
channel.description: Recent content in About on The Modern Jihad

item.title: About
item.description: This website is a work of fiction! NONE OF IT IS REAL. Settle down! Enjoy. This is a study of a descent into fundamentalism that is guided not by love or good virtues but by a desire for revenge masked in the name of jesus. A form of mental illness allowed to run rampant under the guise of faith. It can happen anywhere. I’ll try and keep this regular, but no gaurentees, I often burn out however.
